main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text:
I threw KOG promo's for over 200 wins to test the ladder. After testing nearly every variant of Archfiends I LIKE this one the most especially in ladder. The Dark world combos help with fish, cyber angels, glad beasts, sylvans, and mirror matches. LOTS OF OTK's. I used other decks like fish, CA, SSA, Hazy, and sylvans for comparison and got to KOG promo's but nothing powerhoused the ladder like this deck or the variant of Hey, Cyber Angels! (its busted) anyways maybe not for tournaments but for ranked ladder this deck is a top pick for fun and effectiveness imo. 

Darkworld dealings, archfiend empress, doom dog, and roar are all interchangeable for your playstyle imo 1-2 of any of them is best.
